name: backend
description: 1. **Python 3.7** - Follow instructions to install the latest version of python for your platform in the [python docs](https://docs.python.org/3/using/unix.html#getting-and-installing-the-latest-version-of-python)

scripts.createdb: echo "password is 'password'" && dropdb trivia & createdb trivia && psql trivia < trivia.psql
scripts.createtestdb: echo "password is 'password'" && dropdb trivia_test & createdb trivia_test && psql trivia_test < trivia.psql
scripts.cleanstart: npm run createdb && npm run start
scripts.cleantest: npm run createtestdb && npm run test

author: Micheal Muirden
